description: O entered the Pok√©mon Ping Pong Tournament in Tatsunami Town where he met Dawn and her Ambipom. After a fierce finals between the two, O invited Dawn`s Ambipom to train in his Ping Pong Center in Vermilion City. Dawn let her Ambipom decide if it wished to continue doing contests with her or pursue Ping Pong under O`s supervision.
name: Ou
